Summary: My mother and I witnessed a sphere-shaped ufo from about 30 feet away out on our farm a few years ago
divs: sighting detailsi was on the second level of my parents house listening to music with the tv on. i heard the sound of a helicopter and then my tv reception became scrambled. as the sound became louder, i thought to myself that it seemed too loud and then i noticed that there was only a fan sound, without an engine and i wondered what was going on. i ran downstairs and into the living room where my mom was sitting, trying to figure out why her reception, too, had been interrupted. the fan sound was really loud still and it sounded as if it were right above the house. we both went outside the front door, which was connected to the living room and ran out to the front sidewalk. we looked up and about 30 feet above us and directly above the house was a black sphere, about the size of a suv, maybe 12 to 15 feet in diameter. it was perfectly round with 2 panels protruding out from opposite sides that were about 5 feet long and 2 feet wide, and a pole on the bottom that extended down maybe 5 to 6 feet, with a reddish\yellow light on the end. the panels did not seem to be causing the flight. i could not figure out where the fan sound was coming from. the craft was very still, besides the slow movement over the house. the fan sound was so loud. there were no markings that were visible to me. the black surface seemed to shine, almost metallic. there were no lights other than the one at the end of the pole. it hovered slowly past us and once it was about 50 feet away, it suddenly became 150 feet away. it did not zip away with great speed, it did not disappear and reappear, it simply took the perspective of being 150 feet away. my mom and i were freaked out. the fan sound without an engine sound running with it was unexplainable. we went back inside and i had the feeling that i wanted to go chase it or call someone. now that i look back on it, i wish i had. my mom picked up the phone and dialed the sparta airport number which was about 5 miles down the road. she reported as best she could what we had just seen and they said they did not have anything on the radar. i shared this story with several people around that time. until recently, as my conversations with people have delved into the ufo subject, i recount this night and people have encouraged me to report my story to someone who will listen. i believe it is unique because me and my mother saw it from such a close range.
